commands.name: ðŸ”„ Restart
commands.command: $wsf = '${workspaceFolder}' -replace '/', '\'; Get-Process -Name 'node','nodemon' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; @(3001, 5173, 5174) | ForEach-Object { $conn = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $_ -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($conn) { Stop-Process -Id $conn.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }; Write-Host 'Restarting services...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', "cd '$wsf\backend'; npm run dev"; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', "cd '$wsf\frontend'; npm run dev"; Write-Host 'Services restarted' -ForegroundColor Green

commands.name: ðŸ”´ Kill All
commands.command: Get-Process -Name 'node','nodemon' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; @(3001, 5173, 5174) | ForEach-Object { $conn = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $_ -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($conn) { Stop-Process -Id $conn.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }; Write-Host 'Processes killed' -ForegroundColor Green
